Booyah!  The Lurkerman is back, and I'm better than eeeveeerr.  Now that I'=
ve finally returned from my long hiatus, there's going to be BIG change aro=
und here.  Courtesty of yours truly, LurkerAbyss.  First of all, I will be =
respected by EVERYONE.  Including the likes of lowly newbies to the authori=
ties themselves, the council.  Second of all, I can't be bothered with path=
etic newbies who don't know how to do this.  So, there will be cleaning up =
around  here as well.  And last, but not least, do NOT even THINK of whinin=
g at me, yelling at me, or insulting  me.  The Lurker era of NBWRPG begins =
right about NOW!
